item.description: Extract query string params (replace qs?) # Assuming current URL is: ?post=1234&action=edit var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); console.log(urlParams.has('post')); // true console.log(urlParams.get('action')); // "edit" console.log(urlParams.getAll('action')); // ["edit"] console.log(urlParams.toString()); // "?post=1234&action=edit" console.log(urlParams.append('active', '1')); // "?post=1234&action=edit&active=1"
